channel.title: I was thinking... [This topic isnt noob friendly-coders only.]
channel.description:
I was thinking and there must be a boolean or void that is like "if player attacks" or something.. and i was thinking that you could make it like if player attacks.. yada yada yada..else if player attacks other attacks back...or something like that.. and i also have another thing. if you think about it.. mage spells are kinda like arrows.. the mage works.. on npc's but why dont the arrows fly through the air like a water/wind wave would? are any of these possible?
NOTE: If you take one of these idea's and find out and make a tut. Please give me 10% for the idea.. if not i will show this forum link to a mod. And THEY WILL SEE that it was my idea.

item.title: I was thinking... [This topic isnt noob friendly-coders only.]
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Dells range only makes arrows stay at the tip. they dont fly through the air. But mage Blasts do. Why is mage any different from range when it comes to airborn attacks?

Oh and if you think the attacking thing might work… PM me and well work on it

Read full topic

item.description:

Yea, I don’t think the first one would be hard… Broken down-

public void attacking
boolean what ever = 1

public void ifAttacking
else if boolean what ever = 1
attack back

or what ever that would break down in coding

And I see the arrows go through the air, what do you mean?
